modName: Daedric Artifacts Improved - Dawnguard Version - SKYRE compatibility patch
summary: Small patch to make DAI (Aedric Ritual Remake) compatibal with SkyRe. Yep, done it because ReProccer haven't.
descriptionHtml:
This small patch will make "Daedric Weapons" that you receive for Daedric Quests usable in T3nd0's Skyrim Redone. Unfortunaly, SkyProc ReProccer can't process this patch because BOSS reports it goes after reproccer.esp patch in loading order. Maybe you can overcome that with BUM for BOSS, but I don't know how to use them, so I took some time and made this patch.

Only thing patched is weapons stats. That involves DAMAGE, REACH, SPEED, CRIT.DMG and keyword tagging (is it a nodachi, broadsword, longsword, shortbow, longbow) and names acompanying that (Dawnbreaker = Dawnbreaker [Longsword]) in SkyRe's manner. MAGIC is untouched (that's why I got Daedric Artifacts Improved in the first place).

Prerequisites: Dawnguard
T3nd0's Skyrim Redone - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9286/ (main + reproccer patch)
Daedric Artifacts Improved - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53004/?

load order - BOSS will unrecognize AedricRitualsRemade.esp and Patch_AedricRitualsRemade.esp (my esp) but, since patch has it's proper master it will be automaticly placed after it. just check so in NMM Plugins tab after BOSS sorted other mods. Also, it's advisable to use my "A Small world patch" http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54297/ if U have issues with accesing castle Volkihiar or Dayspring Canyon (RealShelter issue)
author: RdX995
